pageContent: Context: Intermediate-risk prostate cancer consists of a highly heterogeneous group of patients. Owing to this heterogeneity and variable prognoses, it is challenging to provide uniform treatment recommendations for men in this group.

metaData.source:
Optimum timing for image-based dose evaluation of 125I and 103PD prostate seed implants
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10571216/
